airtrafficcontrol.app

Class OptionsMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.OptionsMenu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainMenuMORREU

    public class OptionsMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class whose instances represent an options menu.

    The last option of an options menu represented by an instance of OptionsMenu is somewhat special in the following manner: when the argument of the method executeOption is the number of the last option of the menu, it returns true (all other executions return false). Yet, in no way the action performed by this option is altered.
    An example of utility of this feature is to consider an instance of OptionsMenu with an exiting option: by making this option the last of the menu, classes that work with this menu receive the information that the exiting option was activated.

    The representation in a string of this instances is a numbered list.

    Implementation notes

    • OptionsMenu instances are immutable.

    Author:
    Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade
